overview: Basketball collides with sports-entertainment as Dennis Rodman teams with Hollywood Hogan to take on Karl Malone and "Diamond" Dallas Page. Goldberg defends the WCW World Heavyweight Championship against Curt Hennig. "The Hitman" Bret Hart takes on Booker T for the WCW World Television Championship. Rey Misterio Jr. faces Chris Jericho for the WCW Cruiserweight Title and more!
tagline: Like Skinny Dippin' In The Shark Tank!
title: WCW Bash at The Beach 1998
